nml_option.name: config_AM_miscellaneous_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member miscellaneous is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_miscellaneous_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_miscellaneous_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the miscellaneous analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_miscellaneous_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_miscellaneous_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: miscellaneousAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the miscellaneous analysis member.

var.name: bulkSalinity
var.description: Bulk salinity of ice in a cell
